messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Happy May-Day
messages.msgSnippet: ... it. I wonder how that would go down in Stepford ;-) there would be a May Day parade too. And possibly drinking... Tomorrow will be the big day for our
messages.messageBody:
> May-Day!!!!
> Back home the town would make a big may-pole and we'd go and dance round
it. I wonder how that would go down in Stepford ;-) there would be a May Day
parade too. And possibly drinking...

Tomorrow will be the big day for our local homeschooling group. That, and
the not back to school picnic on the first day of school, are the big events
of the year for us. My granddaughter will be dancing in the may-pole dance
as well as with her Renaissance dance troup. Some of the kids will be
playing music. And everyone will just play and yak all afternoon. One year
the hostess made some spiked punch, but the teens got into it. <g>
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...

messages.subject: Happy May-Day
messages.msgSnippet: May-Day!!!! Back home the town would make a big may-pole and we d go and dance round it. I wonder how that would go down in Stepford ;-) there would be a May
messages.messageBody:
May-Day!!!!
Back home the town would make a big may-pole and we'd go and dance round it. I wonder how that would go down in Stepford ;-) there would be a May Day parade too. And possibly drinking...

Shyrley
